7337041C.Line19.BAE4: Only the blessed can open the way.

A313225F.Line15.6D03F: Yes. But to be blessed by the Prime Evils... damn risky.

F3494E2C.VoiceDir15.6D03F: Weary, hesitant. Lorath knows receiving blessings from Prime Evils is a big risk.

F413C4CC.Line3.6D03F: Somewhere in this paradise, the Triune has reclaimed its ancient temple. Trouble is, we canâ€™t simply walk in.
